sections.part1: Part I Core Philosophy and Definitions

0.title: Introduction
0.summary: Natural Coin is a new philosophy of money built on circulation, decay, and resonance.

1.title: Chapter 1 Core Definitions: Human・Currency・Nature
1.summary: Defines the triad relationship between Human, Currency, and Nature as the philosophical foundation of Natural Coin.
body: The first core definition establishes Human as the subject of value, Currency as the medium of exchange, and Nature as the grounding system.
This triad relationship is the philosophical root of Natural Coin, binding human society with ecological balance.

2.title: Chapter 2 Introduction to Natural Coin: Flow and Decay
2.summary: Introduces Natural Coin as a system based on flow, decay, and resonance, contrasting with traditional capital logic.
